com.cloudera.oryx.app.classreg.predict

Class CategoricalPrediction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.app.classreg.predict.Prediction
      • com.cloudera.oryx.app.classreg.predict.CategoricalPrediction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class CategoricalPrediction
extends Prediction
    Represents a prediction of the value of a categorical target. The prediction is not just a single category value, but a probability distribution over all known category values.
    See Also:
    NumericPrediction, Serialized Form
